original_title: Les trains partent toujours à l'heure
overview: Diane and her best friend, Mathias, are waiting for Mathias' train for Nogent le Rotrou. They are talking each other of banalities but really, Diane wants to confess her feelings to Mathias before he leaves... She has no idea that Mathias is going to make an unexpected revelation to her : he is going to marry... Philippe !
title: Les trains partent toujours à l'heure
